name: Sales Person Commission Sumarry Total
query:
select a.territory as "Territory::100",
     sum(a.net_total) as "Amount:Float:150",
     sum(a.total_qty) as "Quantity:Float:80",
	 a.sales_person as "Sales Person::150",
	 a.commission_rate as "commission Rate:100",
	 sum(incentives) as "Incentives:Float:100"
     from
     (
		SELECT dt.territory,dt.net_total,dt.total_qty, st.commission_rate,st.sales_person, st.allocated_percentage, 
		st.allocated_amount, st.incentives from `tabSales Order` dt inner join `tabSales Team` st on dt.name = st.parent 
		where st.parenttype = 'Sales Order' and dt.docstatus = 1) a
        group by a.sales_person order by a.sales_person asc;
